name: Supermarket Rush
description:
Supermarket Rush is a fast-paced racing game. Whizz through the aisles and collect the items on your shopping list before time runs out! Play alone or go it with a friend.

Player 1

  • Move - WASD
  • Interact - E
  • Brake - LSHIFT

Player 2

  • Move - IJKL
  • Interact - U
  • Brake - SPACE
